Package View

Class DisplayManager

java.lang.Object
View.DisplayManager
public class DisplayManager extends Object
The DisplayManager class provides static methods to display various pieces of information about hotels, rooms, and reservations.

  • Constructor Summary

      checkInDate - the check-in date
      checkOutDate - the check-out date

      roomName - the name of the specific room to be displayed

      room - the room containing the reservations to be displayed

      hotel - the hotel to search for reservations
